data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grubbs, Scott A., Dewalt, R. Edward (2018): Perlesta armitagei n. sp. (Plecoptera: Perlidae): More cryptic diversity in darkly pigmented Perlesta from the eastern Nearctic. Zootaxa 4442 (1): 83-100, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.1.4|24 occurrences
